easySelfieUpload.title: Easy Selfie Upload

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
privacyFirst.description: Control your data with public/private gallery options and permanent deletion whenever you choose.

affordablePricing.title: Affordable Pricing
affordablePricing.description: Clear one-time AI training cost and just $0.03 per generated photo. No hidden fees or subscriptions.

thousandsOfStyles.title: Thousands of Styles
thousandsOfStyles.description: Generate thousands of unique photos with our "Surprise Me!" feature and custom photo prompts.

easyCustomization.title: Easy Customization
easyCustomization.description: Enhance your prompts for personalized outcomes and create similar masterpieces from public photos.
